createwiki-defaultmainpage: __NOTOC__ == Welcome to {{SITENAME}}! == This Main Page was automatically created by a wiki creator (a volunteer who created this wiki per a request), and it seems it hasn't been replaced yet. === For the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki === Hello, and welcome at your new wiki! Thank you for choosing Miraheze for the hosting of your wiki, and we hope you will enjoy our hosting. You can immediately start working on your wiki, whenever you want. Need help? No problem! We will help you with your wiki as needed. To make a start we have added a few links about working with MediaWiki: * [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Contents MediaWiki guide (e.g. navigation, editing, deleting pages, blocking users)] * [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/FAQ Miraheze FAQ] ==== But Miraheze, I still don't understand X! ==== Well, that's no problem. Even if something isn't explained in the documentation/FAQ, we still are happy to help you. You can find us here: * [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Help_center On our own Miraheze wiki] * On IRC in #miraheze on irc.freenode.net ([irc://irc.freenode.net/#miraheze direct link]; [http://webchat.freenode.net?channels=%23miraheze webchat]) === For a visitor of this wiki === Hello, the default Main Page of this wiki (this is the default Main Page) has not been replaced yet by the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki. The bureaucrat(s) might still be working on a Main Page, so please check this page again later!
createwiki-desc: An extension to easily create new wikis on a wiki farm.
requestwiki-error-csrf: Sorry, the wiki could not be created due to a loss of session data. Please submit the form again. If that doesn't work, please [[Special:Userlogout|log out]] and log back in.
createwiki-error-dbexists: A wiki with that database name already exists.
createwiki-error-requesternonexistent: The requester doesn't exist on Miraheze Meta.
createwiki-error-notalnum: The database name may not contain non-alphanumeric characters.
createwiki-error-notlowercase: The database name may not contain uppercase letters.
createwiki-error-notsuffixed: The database name doesn't end in a valid suffix (e.g. 'wiki').
createwiki-error-usernotcreated: The requester user was not created on the wiki.
log-description-farmer: This log tracks wiki requests, wiki creations and everything related to it.
requestwiki-error-csrf: Sorry, the request could not be submitted due to a loss of session data. Please submit the form again. If that doesn't work, please [[Special:Userlogout|log out]] and log back in.
requestwiki-error-nodomain: You must specify either a subdomain or custom domain.
requestwiki-error-notallfilledin: You have to fill in at least the wiki name and language fields.
requestwiki-error-twodomains: You specified both a subdomain and custom domain: you can only choose between one of them.
requestwiki-header: You are going to request a new wiki at Miraheze, great! We need you to fill in this form, before we can review your request. Your wiki request will be reviewed by a volunteer, and it can be tracked at the page that will be given when submitting your request. If you want a custom domain for your wiki (i.e. not a standard .miraheze.org subdomain), please read [$1 this] first. When you request a wiki, you automatically agree to our [[Dormancy Policy]].
requestwiki-label-comments: Comments (e.g. what is your wiki about?):
requestwiki-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can request a wiki.
requestwiki-success: Your wiki request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed by a volunteer as soon as possible.
requestwikiqueue-request-header-changest: Change the status of this wiki request
requestwikiqueue-request-header-requeste: Comment given by the wiki requester
requestwikiqueue-request-status: Change the status of this wiki request
